snippet.title: Demon Crush | Demo Trailer (Demo available now!)
snippet.description:
Kickstarter LIVE NOW: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/demon-crush/demon-crush-game
Demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2753400/Demon_Crush/
Trailer OST: Kashdan Music

An ode to nostalgic 16-bit gaming that is inspired by classics such as Ninja Gaiden, Shinobi, and Castlevania. DEMON CRUSH is a fast paced, side scrolling combat platformer set in a fantasy world based on the history and martial arts of ancient Japan. Battle warriors, demons, and beasts as you avenge the fallen and defend your home against the deceitful warlord Nezumo and his demonic master, Mathonas.

In Demon Crush, you become Kenzo Yagimoto as he defends his home from an otherworldly evil returning from the ancient past. Master the weapon arts of the Yagimoto clan to save your beloved Gochima village from the burning blades of the warlord Nezumo and the dark secrets concealed in his hidden fortress! Only then can you confront his long-forgotten demon master, and save your world from being consumed by the endless hunger of demon hordes.

Demon Crush is a fast-paced 2D sidescrolling combat-platformer that blends expressive, combo-based fighting mechanics with the charming visuals and intuitive controls of a bygone era. Play as multiple characters, master different weapons and combat styles, and plunge into adrenaline-soaked action in a fantasy Japanese setting. Wall jumps, air combos, grappling hook traversal, super moves, chaotic battles, death-defying leaps, and razor-sharp duels to the death against inhuman, villainous bosses all await you!
